item.description: Learn some fun techniques using color sprays and water. We'll explore these techniques by using a variety of stencils to create interesting shapes. Then, we'll practice "ghosting" by using water to take away some of the color. Please bring mister spray bottles to this class. It's guaranteed fun, but ink can be messy, so please don't wear your best clothing!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Color Spraying Techniques
